name: The Tamepaddled Incident
description:
"Shipments of ore have stopped coming from the dwarven mines of Tamepaddled.  Around the same time, strange radio broadcasts began coming from the region.  Nobody knows what's going on, but if you can find out, it will likely sell papers."

The Tamepaddled Incident is a top-down adventure game set in a fantasy world which has entered a period analagous to the 1920's in our own world.

This was made for Retrograde Jam 3, expect post-jam updates.   I recommend using MESEN to run this game(made with NESMaker), not sure if it will work in other emulators.
